logs.title: Main Systen Changes:
items: Removed Experimental Github Update Detection System.
Stablize the game loader ui bugging sometimes and sometimes showing, fixed.
Decreased optimization level due to bugs.

logs.title: Blade Ball Changes:
items: Due to unclear stuff I changed the description abit and fixed ui vanishing when respawning.
Automation of detecting whenever the use of lite or normal.

versions.notes: Where click sound? idk what yall talking abt blade ball being laggy, works fine for me.

logs.title: Main Systen Changes:
items: Added an Experimental Github Update Detection System. (Checks every 3 minutes)
Added Revert Version Feature. this reverts to the last update of Plutonium, this may be used if your having issues with the present.

versions.notes: Thanks, April fools event shall continue to haunt you, it'll be back in 2026 dw, when must the rewrite wave happen though.. Click sounds will be added soon.
